document_data.name: Roaringhorn
document_data.mainbody: '''Roaringhorn''' ({{Pronounce|ROR|ing|horn|refs=}}) was a noble house of [[Waterdeep]]. Both the Waterdhavian and [[Cormyr]]ean branches of the family had a historical reputation for being bold, impetuous, and living with a zest for life. Their detractors characterized them as reckless, boorish, and lustful.{{Cite dragon/280/The New Adventures of Volo: Lost Treasures of Cormyr, Part 3|86}}
document_data.Activities: As of the {{YearlinkName|1370}}, they bred horses in [[Amphail (village)|Amphail]], where they owned an estate and had personal guards. The head of the family had six nieces, all of whom were [[wizard]]s. These nieces used their [[magic]] to keep watch for thieves and other ill-doers.
document_data.Base of Operations: The Roaringhorn Villa, known as the "[[High House of Roaringhorn]]", was located in the [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]], on the west side of [[Belzound Street]] between [[Tarsar's Street]] and [[Suldown Street]].
